exceptions.tactic: intros Data nodes serialize deserialize ds_inverse d qcoh_hypothesis.
intros Data' nodes serialize deserialize ds_inverse d qcoh_hypothesis.
intros Data' nodes' serialize deserialize ds_inverse d qcoh_hypothesis.
intros Data' nodes' serialize' deserialize ds_inverse d qcoh_hypothesis.
intros Data' nodes' serialize' deserialize' ds_inverse d qcoh_hypothesis.
intros Data' nodes' serialize' deserialize' ds_inverse' d qcoh_hypothesis.
intros Data' nodes' serialize' deserialize' ds_inverse' d' qcoh_hypothesis.
unfold qcoh, valid, dsoup, dstate, soup, dom, localCoh in qcoh_hypothesis.

exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the term "d" leads to a term fun d0 : dstatelet => forall H0 : qcoh d0, (?cT@{d:=d0; H:=H0} -> bool) -> valid (s d0) which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "valid" of type "forall cT : pcm, cT -> bool" cannot be applied to the terms "union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)" : "pcm" "s d0" : "T" The 2nd term has type "T" which should be coercible to "PCM.sort (union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage))".

original: intros Data nodes serialize deserialize ds_inverse d qcoh_hypothesis. unfold qcoh, valid, dsoup, dstate, soup, dom, localCoh in qcoh_hypothesis. destruct d as [dstate dsoup]. unfold valid, dstate in qcoh_hypothesis. destruct qcoh_hypothesis as [H1 H2 H3 H4]. unfold valid, dsoup in H2. apply H2.
